abstract: Department of Health and Human Services declares public health emergency in Puerto Rico due to Zika virus, which has infected over 10,000 of island's residents.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: More than 10,000 cases have been confirmed on the island, including infections in over 1,000 pregnant women, and dozens more are reported each day.
snippet: More than 10,000 cases have been confirmed on the island, including infections in over 1,000 pregnant women, and dozens more are reported each day....

headline.main: U.S. Declares Zika an Emergency in Puerto Rico
headline.print_headline: U.S. Declares the Zika Virus an Emergency in Puerto Rico
